channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Find the others
item.description: New years bring resolutions, but those resolutions rarely stick. Creating change is difficult, and it’s hard to do it alone. New years remind us that ...

item.title: Trying To Lose Weight In 2025? Don’t Skip Breakfast
item.description: Eating a decently-sized, balanced breakfast may be key to weight loss, according to a study from scientists in Spain.

item.title: The Biggest Netflix Movie Of 2024 Gets A Hilarious Spoof
item.description: Carry-On gets the Pitch Meeting treatment.

item.title: Winging it

item.title: The Digital Transformation Of Public Initiatives: Paving The Way For An Inclusive Future
item.description: Digital transformation has become a critical priority for governments worldwide.
